getIntensity(Point3D) - Method in class elements.PointLight
get the PointLight contribution to the color's intensity of a point the intensity attenuation formula: i=I0/(kc+kl*d+kq*d^2) when d is the distance from position to p
getIntensity(Point3D) - Method in class elements.SpotLight
